attributes.action: Cancel all exams being taken place in the UK 2021
attributes.additional_details: Every student no matter what exam they're taking within the UK has been disrupted by covid-19 resulting in remote learning. This is unfair for ALL students as they have missed almost a years worth of work in their academic year. Some students have to travel which is clearly unsafe and unfair. This will include international students (IGCSE's, IALEVEL's, IB etc.;) The only fair way to proceed is to cancel ALL exams taken within the UK.
attributes.background: Cancel ALL exams being taken in the UK, including international exams.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/570228
